channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Macaulay Culkin Announces Home Alone 35th Anniversary Tour
item.description: 🏠✨ Ready to rock around the Christmas tree with Macaulay Culkin on tour? It's gonna be a holiday season to remember! 🎶 #HomeAloneTour25 🎄

item.title: Bruno Mars Ringing in 2026 with New Year’s Shows at Dolby Live at Park MGM
item.description: 🎉 Let's party with Bruno Mars into 2026 at Dolby Live! Start the year with music and magic! 🎶 #BrunoMars #NewYearsEve

item.title: Brandy and Monica Announce 2025 Co-Headlining “The Boy Is Mine Tour”
item.description: 🎤 Get ready to vibe again with Brandy and Monica on the "The Boy Is Mine Tour" in 2025! Who's excited for this iconic duo to hit the stage together? 🎶 #BrandyMonicaReunion

item.title: KPop Demon Hunters Breaks Billboard Soundtrack Record As It Becomes Netflix’s First Box Office #1
item.description: 🎵 KPop takes over the charts and the big screen! 🌟 Who's ready for this epic soundtrack? #KPopDemonHunters 🔥

item.title: Gorillaz Are Now Playable Characters in Fortnite
item.description: 🎶 Get ready to groove with Gorillaz in Fortnite! Join the virtual stage for some epic musical adventures 🎮🐒 #Gorillaz #FortniteFun
